body:
Hey everyone, i will not go too in depth with the details of the channel, because i have other posts on this sight about it in Media, but please check out miningflamingo and be sure to like and subscribe!
Enjoy - 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVCk3iskzQ6zKP85VYTZOoA - this link is the channel.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5lWfbcddamI - this one is episode 2 (brand new!)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XBITlOYi93E - and heres episode 1

Thanks for the support and a subscription could lead to you being in a video or a shoutout!

- OPTOBAT

title: Avicus Hits YouTube!

replies.body:
OH! and also guys (and girls) does anyone know a really cool website where we could create an amazing channel art? If you do, could you please reply :)
Thanks - OPTOBAT

replies.body: Great video, keep up the good work! :D
replies.body_tagged: Great video, keep up the good work! :D

replies.body:
Thanks for the current support guys, it means so much to us and our channel :)
Please keep it up: likes and subscriptions are greatly appreciated!
Links to miningflamingo's channel are above!

replies.body:
I use adobe Photoshop for my channel art. https://www.youtube.com/user/mlgporky
I will be making more channel art soon so let me know how you like it. You can't make channel art on a website. It just looks bad that way. You need to learn an editing software such as photoshop cc to make good youtube channel art, icon, or thumbnails.
replies.body_tagged:
I use adobe Photoshop for my channel art. https://www.youtube.com/user/mlgporky
I will be making more channel art soon so let me know how you like it. You can't make channel art on a website. It just looks bad that way. You need to learn an editing software such as photoshop cc to make good youtube channel art, icon, or thumbnails.

replies.body: Thanks for the feedback, and yeah I've been strongly considering just reverting to photoshop; after all its probably the most professional and stylised way of making the channel art :) Also your channel and channel art is amazing! you should make more DEFINITELY! Keep it up :)
replies.body_tagged: Thanks for the feedback, and yeah I've been strongly considering just reverting to photoshop; after all its probably the most professional and stylised way of making the channel art :) Also your channel and channel art is amazing! you should make more DEFINITELY! Keep it up :)

replies.body: Turn down the intro for your videos, that hurt my ears.
replies.body_tagged: Turn down the intro for your videos, that hurt my ears.

replies.body: Okay, i can tell that to miningflamingo, as they aren't MY videos, they are a friend of mine's BUT that is something we can definitely work on :) Thanks for the feedback

replies.body:
Hey guys just an update on the channels! 
First off, on some other post, people have said that these videos are good and all, but they're not mine! :) They belong to my friend MiningFlamingo :)
I did mention in a post that my channel will be kicking off very soon with a trailer of what is to come...
Also if you're new to this discussion, please check out the channel and leave a like and subscribe :)
Thanks everyone - OPTOBAT
